# French Business Writing Training Courses
## Overview

The government of Canada, through Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC), is seeking to provide French business writing professional training services for employees of the Service Canada Quebec Region (SC-QC).

## Objective

The ultimate goal of this translation training initiative is to enhance the written and oral communication skills of SC-QC employees, thereby improving the quality and effectiveness of reports, briefing notes, and strategic notes. By developing concise and persuasive writing skills, employees will be empowered to quickly formulate strategic recommendations that support informed decision-making.

## Training Curriculum

The proposed training program will cover the following essential topics:

1.  Writing Reports
2.  Writing Briefing Notes
3.  Clear, Concise, and Impactful Writing and Oral Presentation

## Contract Period

The estimated contract duration is from the contract award date to March 31, 2024, with three optional years.
